'''Ellen Embry''' is the wife of [[Keith Embry]].

==History==
Pete came to Ellen when he was looking for her husband, Keith, a drug addict who was missing. She said she hadn't seen him in months and believed Pete was enabling him by giving him clean needles. She believed that Keith was beyond hope. However, Pete arranged for Keith to be put on a 51-50 psychiatric hold. Ellen was still not convinced that it would work, saying he had to want to get better. Pete issued him that he could get there.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is married to [[Keith Embry]]. She says she loves him, but his drug use tore them apart. She spent time enabling him before giving up and realizing he wasn't going to get better because he didn't want to.
